item.Q:

my goodness; to drink
item.A:
hē

xìng

item.Q:
Write the character: jiè
(jièkuǎn de jiè)
item.A:
to lend; to borrow; excuse; pretext; by means of; to seize (an opportunity); to take (an opportunity)
借款 jièkuǎn loan
hējiǔ to drink (alcohol)
tōutōu stealthily; secretly; covertly; on the sly
tōukàn peep

traditional: 偷聽
tōutīng to eavesdrop; to monitor (secretly)
xiǎotōu thief
zhǔfàn culprits

traditional: 從犯
cōngfàn accessary
zhèngzhìfàn political prisoner

traditional: 殺人犯
shārénfàn murderer; homicide
fànrén convict; prisoner; criminal
fànfǎ to break the law
fànzuì to commit a crime; crime; offense

traditional: 犯規
fànguī to break the rules; an illegality; a foul
zuìfàn criminal
yàofàn important criminal

traditional: 進犯
jìnfàn invasion
yǒngshì a warrior; a brave person
yǒngwǎngzhíqián to advance bravely
yǒnggǎn brave

traditional: 勇氣
yǒngqì courage; valor

traditional: 義勇
yìyǒng courageous; righteous and courageous

traditional: 義勇軍
yìyǒngjūn volunteer army
xìngmíng name and surname
bǎixìng common people
lǎobǎixìng ordinary people; the "person in the street"
guāngshù beam

traditional: 束手無策
shùshǒuwúcè lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (成语 saw); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
bōshù beam
guǎnshù control

traditional: 約束
yuēshù restrict; limit to

traditional: 結束
jiéshù termination; to finish; to end; to conclude; to close

traditional: 結束語
jiéshùyǔ concluding remarks
huāshù bouquet

traditional: 裝束
zhuāngshù attire; clothing

traditional: 電子束
diànzǐshù beam of electrons
lěngdàn cold; indifferent
píngdàn flat; dull; ordinary; nothing special
àndàn dim; faint; dismal; gloomy
dànhuà desalting
dànjì (n) off season; slow business season
dànshuǐ potable water (water with low salt content); fresh water

traditional: 淡水魚
dànshuǐyú fresh-water fish
dàndàn (adj) dull; unenthusiastic
qīngdàn light (of food, not greasy or strongly flavored); insipid; slack (sales)

traditional: 古詩
gǔshī old verse; classical Chinese poem

traditional: 史詩
shǐshī epic

traditional: 詩人
shīrén bard; poet

traditional: 詩句
shīgōu posy
shījù verse

traditional: 詩學
shīxué poetics

traditional: 詩意
shīyì poetic

traditional: 詩書
shīshū the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经 and the Book of History 書經|书经; books or literature in general

traditional: 詩歌
shīgē poem

traditional: 詩篇
shīpiān a poem; a composition in verse; fig. epic (compared with historical epic); the biblical Book of Psalms

traditional: 詩經
shījīng Shi Jing (Book of Songs, early collection of Chinese poems)

traditional: 曉得
xiǎode to know

traditional: 破曉
pòxiǎo daybreak

traditional: 通曉
tōngxiǎo proficient (in sth); to understand sth through and through
jièzhù to get help from
jièkǒu excuse; pretext

traditional: 借據
jiè i o u

traditional: 借調
jièdiào temporary transfer
jǐajiè loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters); character acquiring meanings by phonetic association; also called phonetic loan
